title: Real Madrid , Seattle Sounders could meet at Club World Cup – Metro US
body_text:
Local News
Demonstrators gathered Thursday outside the headquarters of the Philadelphia Parking Authority at 8th and Arch streets, calling on the agency to terminate its contract with U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.
Things to Do
A bold, R-rated twist on traditional magic has grown into a worldwide sensation for Australia’s 'The Naked Magicians.' Now, the adults-only hit returns to Philadelphia on Feb. 21 for the ultimate night out with a playful blend of comedy, illusion, and fun.
Sports
Tyrese Maxey began the season by declaring the standard he wants to set for the Sixers, but so far, the team has failed to live up to it.
With one spot up for grabs in Spring Training, which member of the Phillies will earn their way onto the Opening Day roster?
The Philadelphia Union's vibe and culture will be shaped by what happens on and off the pitch. Will the players, coaches, and front office live up to fans' expectations?
While tournament play officially began yesterday at the 2026 Winter Olympics, it was today that the North American heavyweights finally took the ice.
Gov. Josh Shapiro believes “housing prices and rent are too damn high for too many” in Pennsylvania.
A new Black-owned and women-led wellness brand, Rise & Ritual, has officially opened in West Philly, fostering community, connection, and holistic well-being.
Amidst ongoing changes in the neighborhood, a soup kitchen in Kensington became an example for business students learning to balance an organization’s core competencies with the moral impact of its decisions.
In its fight to restore the President’s House exhibit, the Avenging The Ancestors Coalition’s strategy is to “raise hell in the streets and raise issues in the courts,” the group’s leader, attorney Michael Coard, said.
Crime
Authorities have arrested a woman for allegedly using a stun gun while robbing a 66-year-old woman last month at a SEPTA bus stop in Oxford Circle.
From brass bands parading down Chestnut Street to King Cake burgers piled high, Philly is ready to let the good times roll this Mardi Gras.
As the nation prepares to celebrate its 250th birthday, Eastern State Penitentiary is introducing 'A Time for Liberty: Our Shared History, Our Shared Future.'
Philadelphia’s new Citywide James Ijames Pass provides tickets to three James Ijames plays at three theaters in the city.
On Thursday afternoon the Phillies released veteran outfield Nick Castellanos. This move was not a surprising one, but one that comes very late into the baseball calendar.
The Philadelphia Union's style of play will be tested in 2026. Will Carnell's press and counter be too rigid to bring success this year?
With J.T. Realmuto back, the Phillies' catcher situation seems status quo. However, with a lot of catching options in camp, will there be a change in the backup catcher position?
The Sixers suffered an embarrassing loss at home to the New York Knicks and will now limp into the All-Star break after being blown out in back-to-back games.
Spring Training is here! Who are the new pitchers that are in camp for the Phillies?
